TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1292-1299
TEI.2.document_title: Imla Keep, et. al. to Unknown, 03-20-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: Depositions and schedule of debts in the case of the bankruptcy of Dr. Imla Keep
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1292-1299

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Depositions and schedule of debts in the case of the bankruptcy of Dr. Imla Keep*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*1. *person_mentioned*Isaac Thomas*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*United states of North America*/location_mentioned*, and state of *location_mentioned*Louisiana*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*paresh of Rapide*/location_mentioned*. This *date_mentioned n="03-20-1826">day */date_mentioned*appeared before me *person_mentioned*Gilbert Legrass a Justice of the peace in and for said *location_mentioned*parish*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Isaac Thomas*/person_mentioned* who being duly sworn According to the Law of said *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned*, did depose that he was acquainted with *person_mentioned*Docr Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* in the years *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1822">1822*/date_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1823">1823*/date_mentioned*, and *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1824">1824*/date_mentioned*. That he was his near *person_mentioned*neighbour */person_mentioned*and had as he believes a pretty general knowledge of his affairs. During those years he is of opinion, that *person_mentioned*Docr Keep*/person_mentioned*s practice as a *person_mentioned*physician */person_mentioned*could not have yielded him on a fair estimate more than five hundred dollars a year, he also states that the *person_mentioned*Docr*/person_mentioned*s attention was principally confined to the cultivation of his *location_mentioned*farm*/location_mentioned*. The said *person_mentioned*Thomas*/person_mentioned* further states—That *person_mentioned*Docr Keep*/person_mentioned* purchased*location_mentioned* part of the Land */location_mentioned*that he once owned in this *location_mentioned*parish */location_mentioned*and which is now owned by the *person_mentioned*deponent */person_mentioned*of *person_mentioned*Col. Thomas Patterson*/person_mentioned*— Who had purchased it of *person_mentioned*Waters and Leonard*/person_mentioned* who held a Mortgage for the ballance of the purchase money due by *person_mentioned*Patterson*/person_mentioned*—to the amt of about four thousand two hundred dollars. The ballance of the Land the *person_mentioned*Docr*/person_mentioned* bought of *person_mentioned*William Smith*/person_mentioned*—who had a priviledge on it for the payment of the ballance due him. *person_mentioned*Keep*/person_mentioned* by his purchase of *person_mentioned*Patterson*/person_mentioned* became bound to pay *person_mentioned*Waters and Leonard*/person_mentioned*—failing in which they obtained a Judgement against *person_mentioned*Patterson*/person_mentioned* on the Mortgage—and had the Land sold on a twelve months bond—when this bond became due *person_mentioned*Keep*/person_mentioned* was still unable to pay and procured this *person_mentioned*deponant */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*John and L. B. Compton*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Joseph and William Brown*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*John L. Lecroix*/person_mentioned* to purchase up the bond and give him one and two years to pay it in— The above *person_mentioned*parties */person_mentioned*did make that arrangement reserving their right to have the land sold and bought in by them for their security of the others. *person_mentioned*Keep*/person_mentioned* paid part of the money due on the bonds at the time fixed—and this *person_mentioned*deponant */person_mentioned*paid the ballance— and to secure himself for this and other debts bought the *location_mentioned*Land */location_mentioned*and took a Conveyance from *person_mentioned*J and L B Compton*/person_mentioned*— The *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*bought of *person_mentioned*smith*/person_mentioned* was sold to pay the ballance due on it When the *person_mentioned*deponant */person_mentioned*also became the *person_mentioned*purchaser*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Sworn to, written in the *person_mentioned*deponen*/person_mentioned*ts own handwriting, and Subscribed before me this *date_mentioned n="03-20-1826">20th, March 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*(Signed)*person_mentioned*I. Thomas*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*G. Legras Jce Pce*/person_mentioned* */p* *p*in and for the *location_mentioned*parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*I certify that I have long been acquainted with *person_mentioned*Isaac Thomas Esqr*/person_mentioned* an *person_mentioned*inhabitant of the *location_mentioned*parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* whose deposition is written above, that he is a gentleman of respectability, and that his deposition is entitled to full credit*/p*
*p*Given under my hand and Seal of Office as*person_mentioned* Parish Judge*/person_mentioned* in and for the *location_mentioned*Paresh of Rapide*/location_mentioned* this *date_mentioned n="03-20-1826">20th March 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Th C. Scott*/person_mentioned* Par. Judge*/p*
*p*2. *person_mentioned*THOMAS HOOPER*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*United Stats of america*/location_mentioned* and State of *location_mentioned*Louisiana*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Parish of Rappide*/location_mentioned* this the *date_mentioned n="03-20-1826">20th day of march 1826*/date_mentioned* this day appeared before me *person_mentioned*Gilbert Legrass a Justice of the peace in and for the said *location_mentioned*Parish*/location_mentioned* */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Thomas Hooper*/person_mentioned* who being duly sworn according to the laws of said state, did depose that he was acquainted with *person_mentioned*Doctor Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* in the years *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1819">1819*/date_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1820">1820*/date_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1821">1821*/date_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1822">1822*/date_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1823">1823*/date_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1824">1824*/date_mentioned* That he was his near *person_mentioned*neighbour */person_mentioned*and had as he believes a pretty general Knowledge of his affairs.*/p*
*p*During the years of *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1819">1819*/date_mentioned* or *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1820">1820*/date_mentioned* this *person_mentioned*deponent */person_mentioned*is not confident which, *person_mentioned*Dr. Keep*/person_mentioned* had an extensive practice and was for a time a popular *person_mentioned*Physician*/person_mentioned*, so much so this *person_mentioned*deponent */person_mentioned*was induced to engage him for the succeeding year as his *person_mentioned*family Physician*/person_mentioned*, but he proved so unsuccessful in his practice and became so very unpopular in those *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*in which he practiced that he considered him so unsafe That altho *person_mentioned*Dr. Keep*/person_mentioned* owed this *person_mentioned*deponent */person_mentioned*the sum of ninety dollars, and he agreed to attend the deponents family for said sum of ninety dollars, he gave up the said debt to *person_mentioned*Dr. Keep*/person_mentioned* and employed other *person_mentioned*Physicians */person_mentioned*in his place when occasion required, altho *person_mentioned*Dr. Keep*/person_mentioned* was receiving the pay of said sum for the same. The *person_mentioned*deponent */person_mentioned*further states that he verily believes that *person_mentioned*Doctor Keeps*/person_mentioned* practice after the first year he came in the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* was not worth five hundred dollars per annum. The *person_mentioned*deponent */person_mentioned*further states that during the latter part of the year *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1824">one thousand eight hundred and twenty four*/date_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*deponent */person_mentioned*started from this *location_mentioned*Parish*/location_mentioned* in Company with *person_mentioned*Dr. Keep*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Colonel Gross's family*/person_mentioned* and that they arrived at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Col. Gross*/person_mentioned*'s residence*/location_mentioned* in the *location_mentioned*Providence [sic] of Texas*/location_mentioned* on the *date_mentioned n="12-24-1824">24th*/date_mentioned* or *date_mentioned n="12-25-1824">25th of December*/date_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*deponent */person_mentioned*is uncertain which and was present when *person_mentioned*Dr. Keep*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Col. Gross*/person_mentioned* attempted to make a settlement, that the deponent understood from the *person_mentioned*parties */person_mentioned*that *person_mentioned*Dr. Keep*/person_mentioned* upon settlement fell in debt to *person_mentioned*Col. Gross*/person_mentioned* to a very considerable amount and that *person_mentioned*Col. Gross*/person_mentioned* gave a bill for goods which *person_mentioned*Dr. Keep*/person_mentioned* was to fill in *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* for the amount of two or three thousand dollars the *person_mentioned*deponent */person_mentioned*does not remember which but believes the latter, which money the *person_mentioned*deponent */person_mentioned*understood was in the hands of *person_mentioned*Dr. Keep*/person_mentioned* and belonging to *person_mentioned*Col. Gross*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*deponent */person_mentioned*further understood from the *person_mentioned*parties */person_mentioned*that a *person_mentioned*partnership */person_mentioned*was to be entered into after *person_mentioned*Dr. Keep*/person_mentioned*s return from *location_mentioned*New Or leans*/location_mentioned* between *person_mentioned*Dr. Keep*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Col. Gross*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Wm. White*/person_mentioned* and that said *person_mentioned*White*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Keep*/person_mentioned* were to take possession of the *location_mentioned*lower plantation*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*(Signed) *person_mentioned*Thomas Hooper*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sworn to and Subscribed before me this *date_mentioned n="03-20-1826">20th. March 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*G. Legras Jce Pce*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*for the *location_mentioned*parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*I certify that I have long been acquainted with *person_mentioned*Thomas Hooper Esq.*/person_mentioned* an *person_mentioned*inhabitant of the *location_mentioned*Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* whose deposition is written above, that he is a gentleman of respectability and that his deposition is entitled to full credit*/p*
*p*Given under my hand and seal of office as *person_mentioned*Parish Judge in and for the *location_mentioned*Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned* */person_mentioned*this *date_mentioned n="03-20-1826">20th March 1826*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*(Signed) *person_mentioned*Th C Scott Par Judge*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*3. *person_mentioned*NARRISH WRIGHT*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Whereas I *person_mentioned*Narrish Wright Sheriff of the *location_mentioned*Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* by virtue of a writ of firie facias to me directed against the goods and chattels *location_mentioned*Lands and tenements of *person_mentioned*Thomas Patterson*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Henry Haynes*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned* at the suit of *person_mentioned*William Waters*/person_mentioned* did seize the following property to wit all the right title and interest of these *person_mentioned*defendants*/person_mentioned* or either of them in and to*location_mentioned* ninety Arpens of Land */location_mentioned*and all the rights priviledges and appurtenances thereto belonging situated lying and being in the *location_mentioned*Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned* on the *location_mentioned*right Bank of the Bayou Rapide*/location_mentioned* in descending*location_mentioned* bounded below by Lands of *person_mentioned*Charles Curtis*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned**location_mentioned*above by the One hundred and eighty arpens of the same tract purchased by *person_mentioned*John and L B Compton*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned**/location_mentioned* at *person_mentioned*Sheriff*/person_mentioned*s sale and being the *location_mentioned*remainder of the tract acquired by *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* or *person_mentioned*Thos Patterson*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned* and*location_mentioned* a Part of the same on which the said *person_mentioned*Keep*/person_mentioned* now resides*/location_mentioned* and having exposed the same to public sale according to Law on the *date_mentioned n="03-04-1824">4th of March 1824*/date_mentioned* for Cash when *person_mentioned*J and L B Camptan*/person_mentioned* became the *person_mentioned*purchaser */person_mentioned*thereof for the price of four hundred dollars which I hereby acknowledge to have received and endorsed as a credit on the execution bearing date *date_mentioned n="03-04-1824">March 4th 1824*/date_mentioned* Now therefore Know all men by these presents that I the said *person_mentioned*Sheriff */person_mentioned*do in consideration of the premises and by virtue of the acts in such case made and provided grant bargain Sell assign and set over to the said *person_mentioned*J and L B Compton*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*their heirs*/person_mentioned* and assigns all the *location_mentioned*above described peice or parcel of Land*/location_mentioned* and all the right title interest or demand which the said *person_mentioned*Thomas Patterson*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Henry Haynes*/person_mentioned* on the *date_mentioned n="06-15-1822">15th day of June 1822*/date_mentioned* as at any time since had in or to the said property or any part thereof there being the following special Mortgages on the same as certified by the *person_mentioned*Parish Judge of the *location_mentioned*Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned* */person_mentioned*in his certificate as follows I cer tify that a special Mortgage exists on the records of my *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*by *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* in favor of *person_mentioned*Thomas Patterson*/person_mentioned* on a *location_mentioned*tract of Land situated in the Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*on the left Bank of the Bayou Rapide*/location_mentioned* in descending *location_mentioned*having a front on the said Bayou*/location_mentioned* of six and three quarters arpens with the depth of forty arpens to secure the payment of the sum of Eight thousand dollars besides interest dated *date_mentioned n="12-23-1818">December 23rd 1818*/date_mentioned* I also certify that another special Mortgage exists by said *person_mentioned*Keep*/person_mentioned* in favor of *person_mentioned*Edmond L Briggs*/person_mentioned* on fo*location_mentioned*rty Arpens of Land to be taken from the lower side of the tract above*/location_mentioned* described to secure the payment of the sum of Seven hundred and ninety dollars and fifty Cents besides interest dated *date_mentioned n="09-19-1821">September 19th 1821*/date_mentioned* I also certify that another special Mortgage exists by said *person_mentioned*Keep*/person_mentioned* in favor of *person_mentioned*Joseph Letchworth*/person_mentioned* on *location_mentioned*forty arpens of the above described tract of Land and adjoining that last Mentioned*/location_mentioned* to Secure the payment of the sum of twenty dollars besides interest dated *date_mentioned n="10-10-1822">October 10th 1822*/date_mentioned* and that no other special Mortgage exists on the records of my *location_mentioned*Office */location_mentioned*in the name of said *person_mentioned*Keep*/person_mentioned* Given under my hand and seal of Office as Parish Judge in and for the *location_mentioned*Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned* this *date_mentioned n="03-04-1924">4th day of March 1824*/date_mentioned* (Signed) *person_mentioned*Thomas C Scott Par Judge*/person_mentioned* To hold the same to the said *person_mentioned*J and L B Compton*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*their heirs*/person_mentioned* and assigns for ever In testimony whereof I have hereunto set my hand and seal this *date_mentioned n="03-04-1824">fourth day of March in the year of Our Lord one thousand eight hundred and twenty four*/date_mentioned* and in the forty eighth year of the independence of the *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Narrish Wright*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Sheriff of the *location_mentioned*Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned**/p* *p*(Signed) sealed and delivered in the presence of*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Wm R Leckie*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S E Cuny*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Done and passed before me*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Th. C. Scott Par. Judge*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I certify the foregoing to be a true copy from the original on file and of Record in my *location_mentioned*Office*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*Given under my hand and seal of Office as *person_mentioned*Parish Judge in and for the *location_mentioned*Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* this *date_mentioned n="03-21-1826">21st day of March A D 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Th. C. Scott Par. Judge*/person_mentioned* */p*
*p*4. SCHEDULE OP DEBTS.*/p*
*p*Be it remembered, that heretofore to wit; on the *date_mentioned n="05-04-1825">fourth day of May Eighteen hundred and twenty five*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* filed in the *location_mentioned*Office of the Clerk of the sixth District Court in and for the Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned* and State of *location_mentioned*Louisiana*/location_mentioned* a Petition, in writing, against His *person_mentioned*Creditors*/person_mentioned*, together with a Schedule of his debts, in the words and figures following, to wit:*/p*
*p*To the *person_mentioned*Honorable William Murray Judge of the sixth District Court., *location_mentioned*Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*The petition of *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* a *person_mentioned*citizen of said *location_mentioned*Parish*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, with respect states to your *person_mentioned*Honor */person_mentioned*That notwithstanding he has used the greatest industry and most rigid economy for years past he finds himself in consequence of his numerous losses and misfortunes in a Condition that renders it absolutely impossible for him to discharge his debts—Your *person_mentioned*petitioner */person_mentioned*further states: that the step he is about to take in making a surrender to his *person_mentioned*creditors */person_mentioned*has alone been produced by the positive belief that whilst encumbered and shakled with such a load of increasing debt in consequence of the *location_mentioned*Rapide*/location_mentioned* growth of the amount by accumulating interest and Costs, that he never could by any rational exertion meet the payment his losses and the payments heretofore made having divested him of every useful means of making, save his personal exertions—Your *person_mentioned*petitioner */person_mentioned*further states that he has been placed in his present unpleasant situation of inability to pay his *person_mentioned*creditors*/person_mentioned*, by misfortunes that he could not control and meeting necessary expences—such as that of having lost his most valuable *person_mentioned*slaves*/person_mentioned*, after having given a large price at an unfortunate period for a *location_mentioned*plantation */location_mentioned*to employ them on, That of having given fourteen thousand dollars for a *location_mentioned*plantation*/location_mentioned*—which was sacrificed for less than a third of the amt at *person_mentioned*Sheriff*/person_mentioned*s sale. That of supporting my *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*, though not an expensive one—Yet a losing one—That of not being able to collect my debts and incurring their loss,—that of having at great expense to attend to an expensive law suit most unjustly Prosecuted against me in the *location_mentioned*state of Mississippi*/location_mentioned* These together with many other causes not enumerated have produced my inability to pay my debts and force me to take that disagreeable step of calling a meeting of my *person_mentioned*creditors*/person_mentioned*—To which end I have hereto annexed a schedule of my property and a list of my active and passive debts, as also a Statement of the debts, due by me, and a Statement of the losses that I have sustained—Wherefore your *person_mentioned*petitioner */person_mentioned*prays to be allowd to call a meeting of his *person_mentioned*creditors*/person_mentioned* at such time and place as your *person_mentioned*Honor */person_mentioned*or the *person_mentioned*court */person_mentioned*may direct, in order that he may be enabled to lay before them a statement of his affairs and surrender them his *person_mentioned*Estate*/person_mentioned*, and that in the mean time all Kind of proceedings against his Person and property be stayed—*/p*
*p*(Signed) *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*A Schedule of debts due by *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned*, with their amts names of *person_mentioned*Creditors*/person_mentioned*,
and place of residence*/p*
*p*Names of *person_mentioned*Creditors*/person_mentioned*— amt debt place of residence*/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*William Smith*/person_mentioned* about $1100
*location_mentioned*Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned* */p* *p*" *person_mentioned*Stephen E Cuny*/person_mentioned*
do do*/p*

do do*/p*

do do*/p*

*p*" *person_mentioned*Jesse Hudson*/person_mentioned* 167 70
do do*/p*

" do do*/p*

" " *location_mentioned*Radide*/location_mentioned**/p*

" *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned**/p*

" *location_mentioned*Par of Rapide*/location_mentioned**/p*

" do do*/p*

" do do*/p*

" do do*/p*

" do do*/p*

" do do*/p*

" do do*/p*

"*/p*

" do do*/p*

" do do*/p*

" do do*/p*

" do do*/p*
*p*Schedule of property and debts belonging to *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Farming Tools, plows, Hames axes etc value------------------------------------ 30.—*/p*
*p*six head of Cows—------------------------------------------------------------------- 50.*/p*
*p*1 saddle and Bridle--------------------------------------------------------------- 20.*/p*
*p*Debts due*/p*
*p*Account for protessional services against *person_mentioned*Matthew Martin*/person_mentioned*------- 140*/p*
*p*account agt. *person_mentioned*McWaters*/person_mentioned* for professional services------------------------ 40*/p*
*p*Notes in the hands of *person_mentioned*Christopher Bullard*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Winchester Tennessee*/location_mentioned* against *person_mentioned*Doctr Saml. Holland*/person_mentioned* decd for----------------------- 1100—*/p*
*p*Account against the *person_mentioned*Estate */person_mentioned*of *person_mentioned*Mrs Manbale*/person_mentioned* deceased for----------- 80*/p*
*p*account agt the *person_mentioned*Estate */person_mentioned*of *person_mentioned*J M Martin*/person_mentioned* decd------------------------- 300*/p*
*p*account agt the *person_mentioned*Estate */person_mentioned*of *person_mentioned*Mrs Spencer*/person_mentioned* decd---------------------- 120*/p*
*p*Due Bill against *person_mentioned*David Manbale*/person_mentioned* balance-------------------------------- 30.*/p*
*p*Statement of Losses incured by *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*In the year *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1819">1819*/date_mentioned*.—*/p*
*p*Three *person_mentioned*negroes*/person_mentioned* worth (men)--------------------------------- 4000*/p*
*p*one *person_mentioned*negro child*/person_mentioned* worth-------------------------------- 100*/p*
*p*In *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1824">1824*/date_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*one negro man*/person_mentioned* worth______________________________ 300*/p*
*p*By expences incured in supporting *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned* per annum $1200 for six years ______________________________________________________ 7200*/p*
*p*By cost, and Expences attending Law Suit-------------------------------------- 2000*/p*
*p*By Interest on debt, due-------------------------------------------------------------- 3000*/p*
*p*By fall of property______________________________________________ 8000*/p*
*p*By losses incured in defending a vexatious law suit brought against me in the *location_mentioned*state of Mississippi*/location_mentioned*-------------------------------------------------------- 1000*/p*
*p*I *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* do solemnly swear that the above and foregoing schedule contains a correct and faithful statement of all the property I possess, either in moveables or immovables, or in Other rights, or claims, except however the clothes and Linen to my use, and the instruments indispensable to my profession by which I make my living, and which the law authorises me to Keep—and I do further solemnly swear that the said schedule contains a correct and faithful statement of my active and passive debts, and of the looses I have experianced in my affairs, and that I have neither directly or indirectly divested anything of my property to the Injury of my *person_mentioned*creditors*/person_mentioned* So help me God—*/p*
*p*(Signed) *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sworn to and Subscribed before me *date_mentioned n="03-07-1825">7th of March 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Benj M Stokes J. P.*/person_mentioned* */p*
*p*On which Petition the *person_mentioned*Judge*/person_mentioned* made the following order To wit; Ordered that a meeting of the *person_mentioned*creditors*/person_mentioned* of the *person_mentioned*Petitioner*/person_mentioned* be held before the *person_mentioned*Parish Judge*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*said, Parrish*/location_mentioned*, on the *date_mentioned n="05-09-1825">second monday of May next*/date_mentioned* to deliberate on the affairs of the *person_mentioned*petitioner*/person_mentioned*, and that in the mean time all proceedings be stayed against his person and property, and untill further Order be had thereon *date_mentioned n="04-09-1825">9th April 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*(Signed) *person_mentioned*W. Murray*/person_mentioned* Judge*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*6th District*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*I certify that I have this day posted up at the *location_mentioned*Jail Door*/location_mentioned* a notice to the *person_mentioned*Creditors*/person_mentioned* of the said *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned*, returnable on the *date_mentioned n="05-09-1825">second monday of present month*/date_mentioned*, according to Law*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-04-1825">May 4th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Wm. R. Leckie Dy Clk*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*And afterwards, to wit, on the *date_mentioned n="05-09-1825">9th day of May 1825*/date_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*Parish Judge*/person_mentioned* gave the following certificate to wit*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* vs His *person_mentioned*creditors*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*On this *date_mentioned n="05-09-1825">9th day of May 1825*/date_mentioned* appeared at my *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*the said *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* by *person_mentioned*Isaac Thomas*/person_mentioned* his *person_mentioned*attorney*/person_mentioned*, and the *person_mentioned*creditors*/person_mentioned* of the said *person_mentioned*Keep*/person_mentioned* failing to appear, and no opposition being made to the surrender of property by said *person_mentioned*Keep*/person_mentioned*, the same is certified to the *location_mentioned*sixth District Court.*/location_mentioned* */p*
*p**location_mentioned*Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned*— Th. *person_mentioned*C. Scott Par Judge*/person_mentioned* */p*
*p**location_mentioned*State of Louisiana Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*I *person_mentioned*William R Leckie clerk of the *location_mentioned*sixth District and Parish Courts for the Parish and State aforesaid*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*—Do certify the foregoing to be a true Transcript of the Record, and all the proceedings had in the case of *person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* vs His *person_mentioned*Creditors*/person_mentioned* exising in my *location_mentioned*Office*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*In Testimony whereof I have hereunto Subscribed my name and affixed the seal of Office This *date_mentioned n="03-20-1826">20th day of March A D 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*(Signed) *person_mentioned*Wm. R. Leckie Clk*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I *person_mentioned*William Murraysole Judge of the *location_mentioned*6th District Court for the Parish of Rapide*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* , Do certify that *person_mentioned*William R Leckie*/person_mentioned* who signed the foregoing certificate is and was at the time of so signing *person_mentioned*Clerk of said Courts*/person_mentioned*, and that full faith and credit is and Ought to be given to his proceedings as such— and the same is in due form of Law—*/p*
*p*Given under my hand and Seal This *date_mentioned n="03-22-1820">22nd day of March A. D 1820*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*(Signed) *person_mentioned*W. Murray*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*6th District*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
